channel.title: Invinsible bodyguard shooting an tentacle
channel.description:
Title meant to sound "Invincible bodyguard shooting at tentacle" sry for misspelling, I don't know how to edit thread title.
The guard that shouts "you outer space octopus" exploded to gibs after 1 hit from tentacle, that's ok. I saved game about 2 seconds before his death, and reloaded it. Then, tentacles hit him over and over, but he never died, as if he had godmode on.
] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a4b at: -2128 x, -1648 y, 1719 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 6 "Xeoxer" UNKNOWN 02:43 36 0 active loopback ] getpos setpos -2128.000000 -1648.000000 1719.831421;setang 20.689991 -82.162750 0.000000

item.title: Invinsible bodyguard shooting an tentacle
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
Title meant to sound “Invincible bodyguard shooting at tentacle” sry for misspelling, I don’t know how to edit thread title.

The guard that shouts “you outer space octopus” exploded to gibs after 1 hit from tentacle, that’s ok. I saved game about 2 seconds before his death, and reloaded it. Then, tentacles hit him over and over, but he never died, as if he had godmode on.
